content.question: In sentence 16, which of the following changes to “The measurements…exact, and” most effectively expresses the relationship between ideas in the sentence?

choices.label: Because the measurements are not exact,
Even if the measurements are not exact,
The measurements are not exact; furthermore,

content.answer: Even if the measurements are not exact,

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
